Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Sequential cleavage of the precursor protein pre - pro - opiomelanocortin ( POMC ) generates the melanocortin peptides adrenocorticotrophin ( ACTH ) , melanocyte - stimulating hormones ( MSH ) alpha , beta and gamma as well as the opioid - receptor ligand beta - endorphin .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Adrenocorticotrophin (ACTH) |
| Melanocyte-stimulating hormones (MSH) alpha |
| Melanocyte-stimulating hormones (MSH) beta |
| Melanocyte-stimulating hormones (MSH) gamma |
| Beta-endorphin |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for my mistake. Here are the valid entities that refer to "Disease" in the given paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Disease":

| Disease |
| --- |
| Adrenocorticotrophin (ACTH) |
| Beta-endorphin |

I removed "melanocyte-stimulating hormones (MSH) alpha", "melanocyte-stimulating hormones (MSH) beta", and "melanocyte-stimulating hormones (MSH) gamma" since they are not diseases, but rather hormones generated by the precursor protein pre-pro-opiomelanocortin (POMC).
